item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, January 29, 2025 at 10:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. An analysis of DeepSeek's R1-Zero and R1 (287 points | 118 comments)
2. Dead Games (79 points | 20 comments)
3. SmolGPT: A minimal PyTorch implementation for training a small LLM from scratch (124 points | 20 comments)
4. Building a T1D smartwatch for my son from scratch (94 points | 15 comments)
5. OpenAI says it has evidence DeepSeek used its model to train competitor (292 points | 1002 comments)
6. A major Postgres upgrade with zero downtime (49 points | 15 comments)
7. Zed's Vim Roadmap – 2025 (4 points | 1 comment)
8. DeepSeek-R1 for Coding in Zed (6 points | 1 comment)
9. I still like Sublime Text (913 points | 487 comments)
10. Ötzi the Lyme Mummy (2019) (55 points | 15 comments)
11. Making the video that made Gorillaz (89 points | 20 comments)
12. Google discontinuing work on Dart macros (5 points | 1 comment)
13. Bacteria (and Their Metabolites) and Depression (358 points | 156 comments)
14. Case Study: ByteDance Uses eBPF to Enhance Networking Performance (75 points | 8 comments)
15. Waymo to test its autonomous driving technology in over 10 new cities (99 points | 60 comments)
16. Frigade (YC W23) is hiring engineer #2 ( | hide)
17. Over Engineered Cars Are Pushing Technicians Away (38 points | 30 comments)
18. Keymapper: A cross-platform context-aware key remapper (6 points | 1 comment)
19. DeepSeek R1 Is Now Available on Azure AI Foundry and GitHub (52 points | 14 comments)
20. Society for Technical Communication to permanently close its doors (59 points | 16 comments)
21. Asteroid Impact on Earth 2032 with Probability 1% and 8Mt Energy (115 points | 122 comments)
22. Adding iodine to salt played a role in cognitive improvements: research (2013) (164 points | 97 comments)
23. Parsing PDFs (and more) in Elixir using Rust (7 points | 1 comment)
24. Astral – "We're building a new static type checker for Python" (187 points | 86 comments)
25. Soviet Shoe Factory Principle (5 points | discuss)
26. Airflow – Stream media files directly from macOS to AirPlay devices (12 points | 6 comments)
27. Effective AI code suggestions: less is more (41 points | 12 comments)
28. Intel doesn't know how to be a foundry," Tim Cook reportedly told TSMC's CEO (138 points | 82 comments)
29. A story about restoring and upgrading a Commodore Amiga 1000 (104 points | 30 comments)
30. Fed leaves rates unchanged, drops reference to inflation 'progress' (33 points | 32 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, January 29, 2025 at 10:15 PM UTC
